title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using the dynamic text content type, the expected behavior is not observed.
OB: When using the dynamic text content type, the expected behavior is not observed. The content does not update as expected, and the dynamic features are not displayed correctly.
EB: When using the dynamic text content type, the expected behavior is that the content updates dynamically as specified, and the dynamic features are displayed correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set the content type to dynamic text.
2. Input the desired dynamic content and save.
3. Refresh the page or navigate to a different section.
4. Observe that the dynamic content does not update and the dynamic features are not displayed correctly.
